name: Hand Repair Balm
description:
For climbers and canoeists, students and scientists, journalists and accountants! Whatever your pastime, our hand (elbow, feet and any other bits of dry skin) repair balm, is a skin loving all natural mix of of butters, oils and beeswax.
Just rub it on where ever it is needed and after a few moments it will be absorbed leaving your skin feeling relieved and soothed.

Contains Hazlenut oil.

Min weight:22g

name: Head to toe Soap
description:
A great all round bar of soap, completely natural and free from any chemicals. Use it from head to toe including hair, and enjoy the refreshing scent from the eucalyptus essential oil. 'One bar does all', an ideal size to travel, this soap is also suitable for use by vegetarians and vegans.

Min weight: 45g

Ingredients:
Saponified olive oil, coconut oil, palm oil, castor oil, sweet almond oil, jojoba oil, and a blend of essential oils.

name: Hand Repair Balm and Soap Combo
description:
Combine our Hand Repair Balm and Head to toe Soap for the perfect skin recovery.

Use the head to toe Soap to keep your skin in perfect condition and then the Repair balm after your hands have been working hard! Allow your skin to remain free from unwanted chemicals!
